unit.data.rain_maker.name: Rain Maker
unit.data.rain_maker.lore: Legendary Wizard working for the most powerful Kingdoms. The Rain Maker earned his moniker for creating a Meteor shower against a horde of Demons.
unit.data.rain_maker.combo.1: Chaos Attack5 or Chaos Block5. Pay Blue or Red Mana for 7 or both for 9
unit.data.rain_maker.combo.chaos: Pay Blue and Red Mana for Chaos Attack9 or Chaos Block9
unit.data.rain_maker.combo.2: All your Attacks become Chaos Attacks or Siege Attacks
unit.data.rain_maker.description.visuals: Curious looking creature, made with a mix of flesh and golden metal. Yellow circular eye sockets. Holding an open magic tome. And multiple meteors made of dark energy falling behind the creature.
